About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Former jazz musician, pastor, and now a software developer.

Currently enrolled at Lambda School

Jazz Musician

Saxophone and Woodwinds

I have played concerts at Lincoln Center and Birdland as well as written original compositions for recordings. This creative background has prepared me to think outside of the box in terms of software development and its' use in the world.

University Professor

Director, Jazz Studies Program

I have created curriculum and taught it to students to give them the skillsets needed to be a successful professional musician. This has given me the experience to plan and execute projects completely in software development situations.

Lambda School

Sofware Engineer

I am proficient in Javascript, React, NodeJS, SQL and have developed projects using these technologies. I also have been using AWS to create, as part of a team, a bot called "Labby"
